identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a math platform that feels like a modern game mixed with a high-end textbook. No boring 'educational software' vibes.
principles: Emotion: Calm Confidence (Blue/Green) vs. High Energy Reward (Gold/Yellow)
Content: Math is beautiful. Use whitespace to let equations breathe.
Zoom: Focus on the current problem. Remove distractions during exercises.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and grade levels. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for problem text, explanations, and UI labels. High legibility.

math.usage: Strictly for equations and numbers within problems.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode default for 'Paper/School' feel. Dark Mode optional for 'Night Study'. Use high contrast in both.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for main containers. Gap-6 for grids.

container_styles.card: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border-2 border-slate-200 hover:border-slate-900 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500/20 focus:border-emerald-500 rounded-lg h-12 px-4

cards.topic_card: relative overflow-hidden group cursor-pointer border-0 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl transition-all hover:-translate-y-1
cards.exercise_card: max-w-3xl mx-auto bg-white shadow-xl rounded-2xl p-8 border-t-4 border-emerald-500

icons.instructions: Use Lucide icons for UI. For Badges/XP, use Lucide icons (Trophy, Medal, Star, Zap) but style them with 'text-yellow-500 drop-shadow-lg' and scale them up (w-12 h-12).

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-900 on Slate-50 backgrounds. Avoid light gray text.
accessibility.focus: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-emerald-500 on all interactive elements.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors (emerald, slate, sky).
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar (Admin) or Navbar (Student).
4. Use the 'Bento Grid' for the Student Dashboard.
5. Ensure the 'Exercise' view is distraction-free (hide sidebar/heavy nav).
6. Use the provided image URLs for the Landing Page and Topic Cards.
7. STRICTLY follow the German language requirement for all UI text.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center-align long text blocks.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
